race.name: Elf
race.age: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.
race.height: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall

feature.name: Darkvision
feature.shortDescription: Within 60' can see in dim light as bright, in darkness as dim(greyscale).

feature.name: Fey Ancestry
feature.shortDescription: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed. Can't be put to sleep via magic.
